content: You are a helpful AI assistant.

Sure — what location would you like the weather for, and what kind of info do you want (current conditions, hourly forecast, 7-day forecast, severe alerts)? Also tell me your preferred units (°C or °F) or ZIP/postal code if you have one.

Got it — 55446. What kind of weather info would you like?

- Current conditions now
- Hourly forecast (next 24 hours)
- 7-day forecast
- Severe weather alerts
- Climate normals / typical seasonal summary

Also tell me your preferred units (°F or °C).

One note: I don’t have live internet access to pull real-time forecasts. If you want an up-to-the-minute forecast, I can either
- Tell you exactly where to get it (NOAA/NWS, Weather.com, your phone’s weather app) and how to read alerts, or
- Interpret a forecast you paste here, or
- Provide a typical seasonal summary and a plausible example forecast for planning purposes.

Which would you like?
